application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x London plane tree T11:  Reduce crown to previous most recent reduction points. 1 x London plane tree T12:  Cut back lateral branches in the north west crown, to provide separation of 1.5 m from the proposed spectator stand at Lords Cricket Club, by reducing  3 branches to their established reduction points and the removal of additional branches beyond established reduction points. Reduce the remainder of the crown to previous most recent reduction points.1 x London plane tree T13: Cut back lateral branches in the north-west crown, to provide separation of 1.5 m from the proposed spectator stand at Lords Cricket Club, by reducing 4 branches to their established reduction points and a reduction in the height of the site-facing leading branch. Reduce the remainder of the crown to previous most recent reduction points.
